game_description: Rival Rides is an exciting multiplayer VR party game taking place in an out-of-this-world theme park. Compete with your friends online in various games and wild rides, in order to collect the highest amount of golden egg trophies and become the Rival Ride’s champion! Discover fun action-packed games offering different challenges and clever uses for your VR headset. Race through a wild underground cart-ride while you switch your own or your rivals' routes. Fight against evil monsters with various weapons in a fast and scary haunted house ride. Jetpack your way through zero-gravity while shooting lasers at each other, or just try not to burn everything when you cook yummy meals for the theme park’s very hungry guests. Don’t forget to customize your appearance, and choose from a variety of awesome and hilarious outfits to outshine your rivals. So, what are you waiting for? Hop on in and join the ride!
review_1: I love the cooking mode reminds me of the game where u cook food give to the customer but cheaper i love the zero gravity mode the 8 headed monsters makes it more competition so does the cart ride the grapple make a lot more competitive i like the one where u shoot the wizards monsters (forgot the name) but really fun overall
review_2: The reasons I really love this game is because there is so many fun and multiple games. I can play with my friends and others and pretty much every time I get into a full match. I love this game and I would play with others
review_3: This game is a very good game if your wanting to play a competitive game online it’s a fun challenge and makes my day when I play it they also do fun game nights every Friday to win cool rival rides merchandise and game cards
review_4: This game should be on the official oculus store there's bunch if fun things you can do with freinds and if you miss echo area play this they have a similar ga.emode but with a dragon fun game 5 stars
review_5: Wow let me just say, this game is pure fun! 4 Mini games which include 2 kart riders which test your aim, zero gravity battle with dragons!?, and a cookout!(favorite btw) more details about each is on a YouTube trailer so check it out. The devs and community of this game is insane with how nice everyone is! Devs are active in the community and even on weekly events like game night they tune in a play with us sometimes. You can get cosmetics with earn-able in-game currency, some bugs as expected with every game but I already know the hard working devs are working on them, This Is a party game! So if you aren’t planning to ask anyone to play in like the discord, make sure you invite some buddies personally to play with you(although the game does offer solo mode). Plans for more games and features have been announced! Join the discord to have a chance to be KING OR QUEEN (Current King) And that’s rival rides! Definitely a pickup for sure!
